text: Benjamin Becker was the defending champion, but he did not compete that year. Last year's runner up Ruben Bemelmans won the tournament, defeating Tim Puetz in the final 7–6(7–3), 6–3. == Seeds == == Draw == === Finals === === Top Half === === Bottom Half === == References == * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Bauer Watertechnology Cup - Singles 2014 Singles
title: 2014 Bauer Watertechnology Cup – Singles
